translations.Mv-HHPBMPrp: Your post mentions a third-party product or business. If your post features or is influenced by a business partner for an exchange of value, our policies require you to tag the partner to show that your content is sponsored.
translations._-h-A0ubsBz: Your post contains information commonly found in branded content, including the name of a possible sponsor. If the sponsor identified here is wrong, you can remove it and enter the correct one. {newline} If your post features or is influenced by a business partner for an exchange of value, our policies require you to tag the partner to show that your content is sponsored.
translations.nv_SvwP1CDu: Your post contains information commonly found in branded content. If your post features or is influenced by a business partner for an exchange of value, our policies require you to show that it's sponsored content by adding a tag. {Learn More link}
translations.sHm_FV336aM: Is this post part of a paid partnership?
translations.sjEAr39didG: Before your post can be published, your tagged business partner must confirm that they have a branded content partnership with you. They'll be able to see this post before deciding whether to approve your Page.
translations.bIUNaX9vRMf: Before your post is published, {=m1} must confirm that they have a branded content partnership with you. They'll be able to see this post before deciding whether to approve your Page.
translations.C9HsF01xYKF: The partner you selected must approve the branded content post that you've already submitted before you can tag them in additional posts.
translations.FE2FTcJFSBb: The Page you're tagging will be able to boost your post on Facebook or Instagram. If the Page you're tagging boosts this post, it will be associated with your Page on Facebook and your linked Instagram account on Instagram. {Learn More Boost link}
translations.ByYT0eOW-K_: Allow business partner to boost this post
translations.RSr-jHxNP-V: Your business partner will be able to share your profile to their audience. You will not be able to edit the post once it has been boosted. {Learn More Boost link}
translations.ohN4MrTbeQ3: Allow business partner to add custom call-to-action button to my post
translations.gDgYL8yTK_-: Your business partner's call-to-action button will link to a destination that they select. They'll be able to change the button at any time without notice or your approval. {Learn More Sponsor CTA link}
translations.LPjs3HIMZTS: Your business partner's custom call-to-action button will link to a destination that they select and will remain part of your post after they've stopped boosting it. They'll be able to change the button at any time without notice or approval. {newline} Adding a call-to-action button to photo posts may cause the photo to be cropped, and the photo may link to the same destination as the button. {newline2}{Learn More Sponsor CTA link}
translations.iJaADEz9rw7: Allow business partner to boost this post without a call-to-action button
translations.1BYUgH9d0St: Allow business partner to boost this post and add a custom call-to-action button
translations.9Wy6WD5SZSL: Branded content projects that you've accepted
translations.5c4EsITdKrT: You can now select a project name when you tag branded content posts, instead of the partner's Page, so the permissions they requested will be enabled automatically.
translations.se1c-Vyjwxm: People who view this post will still see the name of your business partner, not the project name.
translations.t5ZcA6B5rxA: You can select one of the branded content projects listed here to tag this post, or search for a different one if you can't see what you're looking for.
translations.9A6X6puPPwN: Don't allow business partner to boost this post
translations.OtpOq1MY4Z7: Posts that contain references to specific categories are subject to certain audience restrictions. {policy_link}
translations.rec_guFNFh5: Pages that you tag will be notified. Business partners will be able to view this post's metrics. {See policies link}
translations.-SQ_9fe2_g0: Enter your business partner's Page or username
translations.xwo37QJnsH1: No business partner is currently tagged
